attributes.title: DO NOT GET!!!!
attributes.review: this app almost made me puke. the entire concept and the delivery was disgusting. they said i had to pay thirty bucks for the premium version. what is this the hub? no. america has never treated me so poorly! i tried to get tickets to the rally but the app never sent me any notifications in time!! better off deleting this useless app and just go on daddy trumps twitter. n e ways #settleforbernie

attributes.title: Worse app
attributes.review: This app took hours to download when it finally downloaded and I went to open it the screen was white and it wouldn’t move so I deleted it re-download it and when I went back everything froze nothing was loading it stopped working this app is a waste of time it just freezes and glitches

attributes.title: I am truly disgusted
attributes.review:
This app is terrible..... I can’t even begin with words to explain how much pain I’m in. Please whatever you do DO NOT DOWNLOAD. This an manipulative app trying to almost control you. 

Now Mr. Trump I believe you are fairly good president, but however I want you to know it is also a terrible decision you are making about “You know what” don’t band the app. Anyways give this app a terrible review.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be updated on news and there isn’t even news on here😡 It took days to download and its very bad for mental health causes anxiety and stress it even does physical damage by making me have to use the restroom....This app needs to be removed expeditiously and fix the millions of bugs😒 Do better Trump we all human and “Make America Better Than What It Once Was.”✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼

attributes.title: Please don’t download if you have a family
attributes.review: They track your location even if you aren’t on the actual app, when they do find your actual location they send a secret camera to your house to monitor you to make sure you don’t speak badly about many RACIST PEOPLE’S PRESIDENT! (via packages you recently bought) unless you delete the app. I DO NOT recommend downloading!

attributes.title: Worst app EVER
attributes.review:
If you are a trump supporter... please get a life and stop obsessing over your money so much thank you 🙏🥰✨

P.S. if your excuse for voting for trump is “yeah I know he’s a bad person but he’s good with the economy!” That’s even worse. Your not even a blind person voting for him thinking he’s done nothing wrong, but your ok with the fact he’s done something wrong but cares more about money then peoples well being.

attributes.title: The worst app to ever exist
attributes.review: This was the absolute worst app that could have ever been put out there. Who thought of the idea to put an app out there to support the disgusting Person people call “president” when Donald trump is nothing but a racist, rapist, and horrible person just like this app. This app should be banned in all parts of the world and should never had existed in the first place just like Donald Trump himself.

attributes.title: Almost gave me a stroke! Had to go to ER!!
attributes.review: I can’t believe this app even exists! I tried to open the app and when I did there was a jump scare right at the beginning! This orange man was standing with his hand in the air and it looked horrific! I thought that my phone was glitching! I almost had a stroke and I had to go to the ER. Me and my phone are now traumatized forever. Please do not support this catastrophe!!!!!!

attributes.title: Stinky🤢(MY FAMILY TURNED ORANGE!!?)(NOT CLICKBAIT)(EMOTIONAL)
attributes.review: I got this app in support it of big daddy trump man, but then my house started to smell. I LOOKED EVERYWHERE FOR WHERE IT WAS!!! But then I realized the smell only started when I got this app. In conclusion, supporting Donald trump makes you stinky🤢 and you don’t wanna be a stinky little trash man(no offense to garbage men you are great). Also, I woke up the next morning, TO FIND MY REPUBLICAN FATHER TURNED ORANGE??!! INFACT, THE WHOLE FAMILY WAS!! I SAY THE NO GOOD CONSERVATIVES TRYING TO PUSH THEIR STRAIGHT AGENDA ON US REASONABLES!!!!!! LAW&ORDER!!!! CHINA!!! NO GOOD RADICALS!

attributes.title: Do NOT waste your time
attributes.review: I have never in my entire existence seen an app as USELESS and POINTLESS as this. The download time took over a week and when I got on the app it was very confusing. There is no reason to even keep this on the App Store if it continues to be like it is. If you try to use it I guarantee that you will have the same problems as me so don’t even waste your time.
